top_questions.text: A sequential data file called "Record.dat" has stored data under the field headings: Roll No., Name, Gender, English, Nepali, Maths and Computer. Write a program to display all the information of those students whose marks in English is more than 40. [4]
What is the default size of text field in MS-Access?​
Which data type is used to store photo in MS-Access?​
